name: Checkout Manager for Woocommerce
author: Al Imran Akash

sections.description:
Checkout Manager lets you customize the WooCommerce checkout fields in every way possible. Currently, you can easily add, edit, delete and customize the WooCommerce checkout fields. This means you can easily customize the fields of billing, shipping, and order notes without writing a single line of code.

Features for existing checkout fields ðŸ‘‡

  • Change the sequence of the default WooCommerce checkout fields
  • Mark or unmark the fields as required
  • Turn on/off any checkout field
  • Edit checkout fields
  • Delete default checkout fields
  • checkout field customizer
  • checkout field editor
  • woocommerce custom checkout fields
  • Change the placeholder
  • Change the class name
  • Rename the labels

Features for adding new checkout fields ðŸ‘‡

  • Set the type of the field as text, text area, URL, checkbox, country, selection, etc.
  • Mark the new checkout field as required or make it optional
  • Make it appear on the WooCommerce Thank you page
  • Show it on the WooCommerce Order Details Page
  • Display the new fields in WooCommerce Emails
  • Give the new field a placeholder text
  • Option to set a new label
  • Create a name field
  • Edit fields
  • Set a class name

Change the display positions

ðŸ‘‰ On Thank you page

  • Show before Thank You message
  • Before Order Details
  • After order details
  • After all details

ðŸ‘‰ On Order Edit Page(Billing Fields)

  • After order details
  • After billing details
  • After shipping details
  • Order items after shipping
  • After Tax
  • After order total
  • After action buttons

ðŸ‘‰ On Order Edit Page(Billing Fields)

  • After order details
  • After billing details
  • After shipping details
  • Order items after shipping
  • After Tax
  • After order total
  • After action buttons

ðŸ‘‰ On Email Template

  • Order details
  • Order meta
  • Customer details

Style the WooCommerce checkout page ðŸ‘‡

  • Change the color of the input field border on the focus
  • Set a color for the input field border on the wrong info.
  • Change the color of the error message
  • Set a color for the field border
  • Change the input field height

For more exciting plugins visit ðŸ‘‰ wpplugines.com
sections.installation: Installation is fairly straight forward. Install it from the WordPress plugin repository.

1.0.2 – 2022-04-21

  • [fix] Fixed error.

1.0.1 – 2022-04-20

  • [fix] Add display position, style option and fixed display all custom fields in thankyou page, order details page and emails

1.0.0 – 2022-04-05

  • [fix] Display fixed in thankyou page, order details page and emails

0.9

  • Initial version release
